title: Gemini Embedding now generally available in the Gemini API
summary: The Gemini Embedding text model is now generally available in the Gemini API and Vertex AI. This versatile model has consistently ranked #1 on the MTEB Multilingual leaderboard since its experimental launch in March, supports over 100 languages, has a 2048 maximum input token length, and is priced a...
content: The Gemini Embedding text model is now generally available in the Gemini API and Vertex AI. This versatile model has consistently ranked #1 on the MTEB Multilingual leaderboard since its experimental launch in March, supports over 100 languages, has a 2048 maximum input token length, and is priced at $0.15 per 1M input tokens.
